## Properties

| Property           | Attribute            | Description                                                          | Type     | Default     |
| ------------------ | -------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `selectedButtonId` | `selected-button-id` | The id of the currently selected button, or null if all are disabled | `string` | `undefined` |
